text:
Potato | Bristol, UK | ONSITE | Programme Lead

Potato are a lead partner on a large scale, multi-year digital project to create a state of the art, immersive experience based around an iconic and globally recognised entertainment brand. We're hiring a Programme Lead to take overall responsibility for the programme delivery.

https://p.ota.to/jobs/programme-lead-bristol/

Other roles include Senior Django Developer in London and San Francisco, Product Leads in Bristol, London and San Francisco - and a variety of design positions across our locations, including a Design Lead in London.

https://p.ota.to/jobs/
